alert.note: Alert for Lee; Russell (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 6:04PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lee and Russell Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 604 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Smiths Station to near Hurtsboro. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Phenix City, Hurtsboro, Smiths, Smiths Station, Russell County Sports Complex, Uchee, Seale, Ladonia, Bleecker, Rutherford, Monterey Heights, Hatchechubbe, Uchee Creek, Fort Mitchell, Ladonia Sports Complex, Fort Mitchell Activity Center, Carter Acres, Phenix Drag Strip and Parkmanville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
